en.is_force_shutdown: Stop the instance. Cut off the power directly. Any data not saved will be lost
en.join_network_tip: Connecting network or subnet for the Cloud VM is up to a maximum of 3. Adding more than one network may lead to routing problems which will cause poor external networks connetions, please proceed with caution.
en.tip_change_pwd: This is a test, the length must between 6 and 8
en.ensure_shutdown: Do you want to shudown instance {0} ？
en.shutdown_tip: The instance will be free 30 days after shut down. After 30 days, will charge system disk's space. CPU/Memory is free.

zh-CN.is_force_shutdown: 强制关机，直接切断电源。没有及时写入硬盘中的内存数据将会丢失
zh-CN.join_network_tip: 一台云主机最多只允许加入3个网络或者子网。加入多个网络可能会引发云主机路由问题而导致连不上外网，请谨慎操作。
zh-CN.tip_change_pwd: 这是一个测试，密码长度必须在6和8之间
zh-CN.shutdown_tip: 自关机起30天内该云主机不收取任何费用，30天之后仅收取该虚拟机系统盘占用空间的费用（等同于云硬盘的费用）。
